title: Valle Aosta
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
Valle d'Aosta The Valle d'Aosta is the smallest Italian region with 3,263 kmÂ² and 128,021 inhabitants. It is located in the Alps, surrounded by four of the highest mountains of all Italy and Europe (Mont Blanc, that with 4,810.90 m is the highest mountain in Europe, Matterhorn (4,478 m), Monte Rosa (4,637 m) and Gran Paradiso (4,061 m)). Rich in history has interesting Roman and medieval monuments and a host of castles to visit. 
photoray has marked this note useful lousat (81666) 2015-07-31 5:43 
Ciao Silvio,un po' chiara ma ben dettagliata,una large view di questa valle sempre stupenda da qualunque posto la si osservi.Buon weekend,Luciano (13418) 2015-07-31 5:50 
Howdy Silvio, Your image of Valle d'Aosta intrigues, like a giant puzzle with hidden clues. Looking and searching for architecture gems, while surrounded by craggy mountains. Well done, and have a great weekend, Ray
